5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Abbas that the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade wearing weapons in the Muslim lands on the two ‘Eid, except if the enemy was present

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ السِّلاَحِ فِي يَوْمِ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning wearing weapons on the day of ‘Eid
